interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy.
The U.S. has the largest economy in the world.
China is home to the world's longest wall—the Great Wall of China.
Japan has more vending machines per capita than any other country.
Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system.
Brazil is the largest country in South America and home to the Amazon rainforest.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
Germany is home to the world's largest beer festival, Oktoberfest.
The United Kingdom is known for its rich history and the British monarchy.
